cu.explanation_en: Setting the CU's NG-AMF IP address to the same as the AMF IP (192.168.70.132) will cause IP address conflicts, preventing proper network interface configuration and leading to connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Changing the DL absolute frequency point A to 640009 misaligns it with the SSB frequency (641280), causing synchronization issues and cell setup failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行鏈路絕對頻率點 A 更改為 640009 會使其與 SSB 頻率 (641280) 不對齊，導致同步問題和細胞設置失敗。
